snippet: The new credit card will use EMV chip technology, which makes a card much more difficult to duplicate than those that use only a magnetic strip.
abstract: Sam's Club plans to announce new, safer credit card that will make it first retailer to switch to more secure payment technology that has been widely discussed since customer-data breach at Target; card will use EMV chip technology, which makes it far more difficult to duplicate than those that use only magnetic strips.
lead_paragraph: The new credit card will use EMV chip technology, which makes a card much more difficult to duplicate than those that use only a magnetic strip.

headline.main: Sam’s Club Plans a Safer Credit Card
headline.print_headline: Sam’s Club Plans a Safer Credit Card
